title: AN ACT TO AMEND § 1102, CHAPTER 1, DIVISION 1; TO AMEND § 2407(f) OF ARTICLE 4, CHAPTER 2, DIVISION 1; AMEND ARTICLE 1, CHAPTER 12; ADD A NEW § 12101.1 OF ARTICLE 1, CHAPTER 12; ADD A NEW § 80110 (c)(11) TO CHAPTER 80, DIVISION 4; ADD A NEW § 86105 (e) TO CHAPTER 86, ALL OF TITLE 10, GUAM CODE ANNOTATED; ADD A NEW § 3102.1 (t) TO CHAPTER 3; AMEND § 16104.1 TO CHAPTER 16; ADD A NEW § 31108 (h) TO CHAPTER 31, ALL OF TITLE 17, GUAM CODE ANNOTATED; AND TO AMEND § 2102 TO CHAPTER 2, TITLE 7, GUAM CODE ANNOTATED, RELATIVE TO INCREASING AWARENESS OF AND STRENGTHENING EARLY CHILDHOOD DEVELOPMENT BY EXPANDING GUAM’S EARLY CHILD CARE AND EDUCATION SYSTEM.
